00012 #ifndef MFEM_FE
00013 #define MFEM_FE
00014 
00015 // Base and derived classes for finite elements
00016 
00018 class FunctionSpace {
00019 public:
00020    enum {
00021       Pk, // polynomials of order k
00022       Qk, // tensor products of polynomials of order k
00023       rQk // refined tensor products of polynomials of order k
00024    };
00025 };
00026 
00027 class ElementTransformation;
00028 class Coefficient;
00029 class VectorCoefficient;
00030 
00032 class FiniteElement
00033 {
00034 protected:
00035    int Dim, GeomType, Dof, Order, FuncSpace, RangeType;
00036    IntegrationRule Nodes;
00037 
00038 public:
00039    enum { SCALAR, VECTOR };
00040 
00047    FiniteElement(int D, int G, int Do, int O, int F = FunctionSpace::Pk);
00048 
00050    int GetDim() const { return Dim; }
00051 
00053    int GetGeomType() const { return GeomType; }
00054 
00056    int GetDof() const { return Dof; }
00057 
00059    int GetOrder() const { return Order; }
00060 
00062    int Space() const { return FuncSpace; }
00063 
00064    int GetRangeType() const { return RangeType; }
00065 
00069    virtual void CalcShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
00070                           Vector &shape) const = 0;
00071 
00076    virtual void CalcDShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
00077                            DenseMatrix &dshape) const = 0;
00078    const IntegrationRule & GetNodes() const { return Nodes; }
00079 
00080    // virtual functions for finite elements on vector spaces
00081 
00086    virtual void CalcVShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
00087                            DenseMatrix &shape) const;
00088 
00089    virtual void CalcVShape(ElementTransformation &Trans,
00090                            DenseMatrix &shape) const;
00091 
00095    virtual void CalcDivShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
00096                              Vector &divshape) const;
00097 
00102    virtual void CalcCurlShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
00103                               DenseMatrix &curl_shape) const;
00104 
00105    virtual void GetFaceDofs(int face, int **dofs, int *ndofs) const;
00106 
00109    virtual void CalcHessian (const IntegrationPoint &ip,
00110                              DenseMatrix &h) const;
00111 
00115    virtual void GetLocalInterpolation (ElementTransformation &Trans,
00116                                        DenseMatrix &I) const;
00117 
00121    virtual void Project (Coefficient &coeff,
00122                          ElementTransformation &Trans, Vector &dofs) const;
00123 
00127    virtual void Project (VectorCoefficient &vc,
00128                          ElementTransformation &Trans, Vector &dofs) const;
00129 
00132    virtual void ProjectDelta(int vertex, Vector &dofs) const;
00133 
00134    virtual ~FiniteElement () { }
00135 };
00136 
00137 class NodalFiniteElement : public FiniteElement
00138 {
00139 protected:
00140    void NodalLocalInterpolation (ElementTransformation &Trans,
00141                                  DenseMatrix &I,
00142                                  const NodalFiniteElement &fine_fe) const;
00143 
00144    mutable Vector c_shape;
00145 
00146 public:
00147    NodalFiniteElement (int D, int G, int Do, int O,
00148                        int F = FunctionSpace::Pk)
00149       : FiniteElement (D, G, Do, O, F), c_shape (Do) { }
00150 
00151    virtual void GetLocalInterpolation (ElementTransformation &Trans,
00152                                        DenseMatrix &I) const
00153    { NodalLocalInterpolation (Trans, I, *this); }
00154 
00155    virtual void Project (Coefficient &coeff,
00156                          ElementTransformation &Trans, Vector &dofs) const;
00157 
00158    virtual void Project (VectorCoefficient &vc,
00159                          ElementTransformation &Trans, Vector &dofs) const;
00160 };
00161 
00162 class VectorFiniteElement : public FiniteElement
00163 {
00164    // Hide the scalar functions CalcShape and CalcDShape.
00165 private:
00167    virtual void CalcShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
00168                           Vector &shape) const;
00169 
00171    virtual void CalcDShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
00172                            DenseMatrix &dshape) const;
00173 
00174 protected:
00175    mutable DenseMatrix Jinv;
00176    mutable DenseMatrix vshape;
00177 
00178    void CalcVShape_RT(ElementTransformation &Trans,
00179                       DenseMatrix &shape) const;
00180 
00181    void CalcVShape_ND(ElementTransformation &Trans,
00182                       DenseMatrix &shape) const;
00183 
00184 public:
00185    VectorFiniteElement (int D, int G, int Do, int O,
00186                         int F = FunctionSpace::Pk)
00187       : FiniteElement (D, G, Do, O, F), Jinv(D), vshape(Do, D)
00188    { RangeType = VECTOR; }
00189 };
00190

00198    virtual void CalcDShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
00199                            DenseMatrix &dshape) const;
00200 };

00592 class RT0TriangleFiniteElement : public VectorFiniteElement
00593 {
00594 private:
00595    static const double nk[3][2];
00596 
00597 public:
00598    RT0TriangleFiniteElement();
00599 
00600    virtual void CalcVShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
00601                            DenseMatrix &shape) const;
00602 
00603    virtual void CalcVShape(ElementTransformation &Trans,
00604                            DenseMatrix &shape) const
00605    { CalcVShape_RT(Trans, shape); };
00606 
00607    virtual void CalcDivShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
00608                              Vector &divshape) const;
00609 
00610    virtual void GetLocalInterpolation (ElementTransformation &Trans,
00611                                        DenseMatrix &I) const;
00612 
00613    using FiniteElement::Project;
00614 
00615    virtual void Project (VectorCoefficient &vc,
00616                          ElementTransformation &Trans, Vector &dofs) const;
00617 };

00856 class Nedelec1HexFiniteElement : public VectorFiniteElement
00857 {
00858 private:
00859    static const double tk[12][3];
00860 
00861 public:
00862    Nedelec1HexFiniteElement();
00863    virtual void CalcVShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
00864                            DenseMatrix &shape) const;
00865    virtual void CalcVShape(ElementTransformation &Trans,
00866                            DenseMatrix &shape) const
00867    { CalcVShape_ND(Trans, shape); };
00868    virtual void CalcCurlShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
00869                               DenseMatrix &curl_shape) const;
